LuminometerSettings.Comment: needs to be set for non-default settings or for new luminometer

Comment: Total inelastic cross section in microbarn, for pp at 8TeV
Use negative number to make clear that no old normalization is available
For low energy pp: 10.2; for pp at 8TeV, as determined in April 2012 scan: 6.36
For pPb, as determined in Sep 2012 pilot run, taking into account that Pb ion is stripped of all its 82 electrons: 6.36/115.8*82
